data.name: Pankapu - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack of Pankapu from Matthieu "Ganaé" Loubiere, which also includes two songs from Hiroki Kikuta !

Track List:


OST 1

  • 01. Eternal Orbis Chronicles
  • 02. Peacefully
  • 03. Green Iketomi
  • 04. The White Traveler
  • 05. Redemption
  • 06. Chii
  • 07. The Garden
  • 08. The lush Forest
  • 09. Sad Ohiiti
  • 010. Brave Ohiti
  • 011. Mudjin
  • 012. Let's Fight #1
  • 013. Motherside
  • 014. White Flower
  • 015. Pebble
  • 016. Red mystery
  • 017. Gangreyne
  • 018. Mio
  • 019. Let's Fight #2
  • 020. Wind of adventure
  • 021. Bonus Track # Act of god
  • 022. Bonus Track # Alone
  • 023. Bonus Track # Blue Crystal
  • 024. Bonus Track # OST 1 Piano Medley

OST 2


  • 1. Wind
  • 2. Shoot them all
  • 3. Gehöd
  • 4. Lava
  • 5. Let's fight #3
  • 6. Remind me
  • 7. Melancholy
  • 8. Itopia
  • 9. Iketomi
  • 10. Let's fight #4
  • 11. Let's fight #5
  • 12. The Door
  • 13. Close the book
  • 14. That's all folks
  • 15. Memolith – Home
  • 16. Memolith – Anger
  • 17. Memolith – Alone
  • 18. Bonus Track – Eternal Orbis Chronicle Ochestrated by Ganaé
  • 19. Bonus Track – Trailer
  • 20. Bonus Track – Lost Trailer
  • 21. Bonus Track – Medley Episode 2


The Soundtrack will be placed in your Pankapu folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\SteamApps\common\

data.short_description: The Official Soundtrack of Pankapu from Matthieu "Ganaé" Loubiere, which also includes two songs from Hiroki Kikuta !

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
